desc: We source and create Christian mugs, meant to serve as simple reminders of truth. Our mission is to surprise and delight our customers while supporting an orphanage in Haiti called Fondation Nouvelle Vie Pour Les Pauvres Enfantes, translated to "New Life for the Poor Children". Reach out anytime for further info!

layout.text:
But thanks be to God, who always leads us in triumph in Christ, and through us spreads and makes evident everywhere the sweet fragrance of the knowledge of Him.
2 Corinthians 2:14
